name: Fae Grove Dialogue Trees
author: MIFF Framework
description: Complete dialogue trees for all NPCs in the Fae Grove trials

grove_greeting.text: Halt, mortal! You stand before the sacred Fae Grove. What business brings you to this hallowed place?
grove_greeting.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: I seek wisdom and knowledge of the ancient ways
I wish to prove my worth and earn entry
I am merely curious about this place

riddle_challenge.text: Very well. To prove your worth, you must answer my riddle. Listen carefully: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?'
riddle_challenge.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: An echo
A shadow
The wind itself

riddle_correct.text: Excellent! You have proven your wisdom. The echo speaks truth without deceit, hears all without judgment. You may enter the grove, wise one.
riddle_correct.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: Thank you, guardian. I shall enter with respect

riddle_incorrect.text: Incorrect. A shadow has form and substance, unlike the answer I seek. You may try again, or return when you are wiser.
riddle_incorrect.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: Let me try again
I shall return when I am wiser

riddle_partial.text: Close, but not quite. The wind carries the echo, but it is not the echo itself. You show promise, but need to think deeper.
riddle_partial.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: Let me think about this more carefully

curiosity_response.text: Curiosity is the first step toward wisdom, but it is not enough. The grove holds ancient secrets that require more than mere interest to unlock.
curiosity_response.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: Then I shall seek wisdom
Perhaps another time

grove_entry_granted.text: The grove welcomes you, initiate. May you find what you seek within its ancient embrace. Remember, respect the spirits and they will guide you.
grove_entry_granted.speaker: grove_guardian

choices.text: I shall remember your words

spirit_greeting.text: Ah, a new seeker approaches the Whispering Hollow. I sense you have been granted access to the grove. What knowledge do you seek, young one?
spirit_greeting.speaker: spirit_guide

choices.text: I wish to learn the art of spirit whispering
I seek guidance on my spiritual journey

whisper_lesson.text: The art of spirit whispering is ancient and sacred. It requires patience, empathy, and the ability to listen with your heart, not just your ears. Are you ready to begin?
whisper_lesson.speaker: spirit_guide

choices.text: I am ready to learn, master
I need a moment to prepare myself

lesson_begin.text: Very well. Close your eyes and open your mind. The spirits speak in whispers, in feelings, in the rustle of leaves and the song of the wind. Listen...
lesson_begin.speaker: spirit_guide

choices.text: I am listening with my heart

lesson_complete.text: Excellent! You have opened yourself to the spirit realm. The whisper scroll I give you contains the ancient techniques. Practice with the spirits in the grove center.
lesson_complete.speaker: spirit_guide

choices.text: I shall practice immediately
Thank you for your wisdom, master

general_guidance.text: The grove is a place of learning and growth. Each step you take brings you closer to understanding the ancient ways. Trust your instincts and the spirits will guide you.
general_guidance.speaker: spirit_guide

choices.text: Then teach me spirit whispering
I shall continue my journey

whisper_practice.text: *ethereal whispers echo through the grove* I sense you have learned the ancient art. Speak to me through the spirit realm...
whisper_practice.speaker: ancient_spirit

choices.text: *whisper* Greetings, ancient one. I seek to practice the art of spirit communication
*whisper* What wisdom can you share with a seeker of knowledge?

whisper_response.text: *the spirit's voice resonates in your mind* Well done, young whisperer. You have mastered the basic technique. Continue practicing with other spirits to perfect your skill.
whisper_response.speaker: ancient_spirit

choices.text: I shall seek other spirits to practice with

courage_challenge.text: You have entered the Shadowed Vale, a place where courage is tested and fears are faced. Are you prepared to prove your bravery, spirit whisperer?
courage_challenge.speaker: shadow_guardian

choices.text: I am ready to face whatever challenges await
What must I do to prove my courage?

challenge_accepted.text: Then let the trial begin. You will face shadow creatures that feed on fear. Stand firm, and remember that courage is not the absence of fear, but the will to act despite it.
challenge_accepted.speaker: shadow_guardian

choices.text: I understand. Let me face this trial

challenge_explanation.text: You must confront the shadow creatures that dwell in the vale's depths. They will test your resolve and attempt to instill fear. Only by standing firm can you prove your courage.
challenge_explanation.speaker: shadow_guardian

choices.text: I understand the challenge. I am ready

shadow_confrontation.text: *dark tendrils of shadow swirl menacingly* You dare to enter our domain? We shall feast on your fear and weakness!
shadow_confrontation.speaker: shadow_creature

choices.text: I fear you not! I have faced greater challenges than shadows
*whisper* I understand your nature, shadow. You are but a test of my resolve

combat_initiated.text: *the shadow creature lunges forward, testing your courage*
combat_initiated.speaker: shadow_creature

choices.text: I shall not back down!

beacon_activation.text: *the ancient beacon stands dark and silent, waiting for one with the courage to light it*
beacon_activation.speaker: ancient_beacon

choices.text: I shall light this beacon with my courage
Let me examine this beacon first

beacon_lit.text: *the beacon bursts into brilliant light, dispelling the shadows and illuminating the vale* You have proven your courage and restored light to this place!
beacon_lit.speaker: ancient_beacon

choices.text: The light has returned!

beacon_examination.text: *the beacon is covered in ancient runes that glow faintly* The runes speak of courage and the power to dispel darkness. Only one who has faced their fears can activate it.
beacon_examination.speaker: ancient_beacon

choices.text: I have faced my fears. Let me light it now
